name: Wrangle The Slimes
description:
The slimes are everywhere and they do weird stuff like following each other or maybe not following each other and their behavior is based on simple rules and it would probably be better if they were contained. Use your mouse to wrangle them. Also you only have 10 seconds to do it. What? That seems really hard? OK fine whatever you can have 10 more seconds. If you want. I don't really care. I made this in five hours for the U WILL NOT LAST 10 SECONDS game jam.

Attribution:

- "Play" by pictohaven from NounProject.com
